website_summaries.verdict: A 2-in-1 cleaning tool that specializes in steaming floors but can also double as a vacuum.
pros: Multipurpose machine that works as a vacuum and steam mop
Can sanitize hard floor surfaces without chemicals
Includes scent discs that help control pet odors
cons: Somewhat bulky and difficult to maneuver
A few mops stopped working for unknown reasons

customer_reviews.title: I Am Excited to Clean My Floors
customer_reviews.text: I actually look for excuses to use this thing. Is something wrong with me? Lol It’s so easy to use and makes cleaning my floors easy and fast. And it does a GREAT job. I have hardwood, vinyl, and tile floors and they all get beautifully clean. I can do 2-3 rooms before having to add more water, although I change the pads between each room. Worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: asbrider

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new house with hard wood floors, well its a nightmare with cats getting kitty litter all across the house and the vacuum just flicking it all over. So I bought this thing and holy crap it cleans well, so not only can you get streak free mobbing (steam cleaning) done but it vacuums up the kitty litter and everything else at the same time. Only have to go over the floors once to sweep/vacuum/mop! Worth every penny. OH and its easy to take apart and clean too. Freaking perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful in the beginning. I've owned 3 in past 2 years and all of them STOPPED STEAMING after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in the beginning, thus some wonderful reviews. I've had 3 of them and all three have stopped steaming after 6 months. Bissell will replace it if it hasn't been very long but they want you to trouble shoot it. The handle switch is cheap and it breaks. "Search Bissell Symphony stopped steaming". Also, the vacuum doesn't pick up when pad is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the machine I gave it 5 stars. Now 2 years 4 months and it does not make steam. I called customer service and after a series of fixes he tells me they can sell me a new machine at a $10 discount from amazon's price. The customer service was confusing. Call me old fashion but I think that a product should last a little bit longer and the company should do a better job of standing by their product. With that said giving this product a one too high. It is a shame because Bissell use to make good products and had great costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Telltales

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my hardwood floors. I have 2 big dogs that track in dust and dirt. The vacuum is very disappointing and could not handle the 1 day buildup of dust and dirt. Dirt clumps were not vacuumed up. The steam mop works well but because the vacuum did not work with well when used the steam cleaner, it is less time consuming to use a good vacuum and my OCEDR spin mop, I love that Bissell is devoted to animals, but I am super disappointed in this product. It was a waste of money and time. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for about two years now, using it about once a month. When it works, the floors do get pretty clean, and it's easy enough to use. The real headline here is this thing is made out of really flimsy plastic. The water inlet cover broke within a week, but it was minor enough I just super glued it. Yesterday, however, when I went to fill it, water started gushing out everywhere. Upon close inspection, I found a dozen thin cracks in the reservoir, which rendered the unit trash. The plastic just isn't strong enough for a device that gets as much abuse as a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like an amazing solution for porcelain tile at first and the vacuum feature had a surprisingly strong suction. It comes with two cotton mop heads that are easy to install and remove for washing. The steam feature is simple to prime and is hot and effective. Sadly, after 5 uses, when filling the reservoir for the steam, the water drained right out the bottom and on to the floor. There was a large puddle of water to mop up. Also the removable footing that holds the mop head became very difficult to attach. I returned it and was given a partial refund due to being slightly over the 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: ... this product doing what it claimed but am extremely satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I had my reservations about this product doing what it claimed but am extremely satisfied with the product. It cut my floor cleaning in half and does exactly what it says which is that you are able to vacuum while steaming the floor. The container that holds the vacuumed floor debris is easy to remove and empty and is not wet. I don't know how it works but love it. Thanks Bissell for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: My friend was raving about hers and so I had to get one. So glad I did. We love in Florida where everyone has tile floors. I’ve shared this product with multiple people. It cuts cleaning time in half. The suction on the vacuum is great. It gets the dog-fur tumbleweeds from inched away. I like that you can use swiffer or the washable mop heads. The eucalyptus solution smells nice in the bottle but don’t smell it when used for cleaning so I’d probably skip that part of the purchase if I were doing it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Christa L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the job. Although it can't be used on laminate floors I do like the machine. I suggest vacuuming or sweeping floors first to get more of the dirt up. Then use the machine with vacuum to steam. Its easy to use. However I wish they would have it detach with a scrubber on end to get those really bad areas. And a possible thinner short arm for hard to reach areas like behind toilets or under cabinets. I'm keeping this machine as long as it keeps working. 2 months before the year is up this machine stopped steaming. Never purchase again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Best steam mop ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this steam mop/vacuum! I used to have two swiffer and I have replaced them both with this! It’s so easy to use and handle but it’s still substantial enough to get the job done! I love that you can use disposable pads because who wants to wash those other ones all the time? Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jojorich

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: A device that vacuums and mops (steams) at the same time is a dream come true. Almost too good to be true but I bought it anyways. And I love it and it cuts my cleaning time in half. I have 5 long haired cats and 2 long haired dogs. I have linoleum, vinyl tile, and real ceramic tile through my house. And this device cleans all these floors, picks up the pet hair, rogue cat/dog food bits, and rogue kitty litter pellets with ease. I’m very impressed with this combo. You do need to read the Operating Instructions though. Will save you a lot of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Saber Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Have had this since May 2019 and already the entire contents of water chamber leaks out as soon as I fill it up. Did the reseating of filter several times with no positive result. Also just trashed a Bissell carpet cleaner because the belt broke and when it snapped it bent the shaft.....fixing it would have cost more than replacing it. These products are cheaply made and not worth the money. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver, cleans up awesome & is a HUGE time saver!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum/mop combo is fricken AWESOME! I’m still wondering what was wrong with me in not trying something like this out YEARS ago! Having two long-haired German Shepherd’s, between my Roomba & this vac/steam mop, it’s soooo much easier keeping up on the fuzz & dust, dust, dust that shows so prevalent on darker wood flooring. I’ve used it 3 times in the week I’ve had it, already washing the mop pads (which I did in hot water alone~ coming out like new) & though the head doesn’t swivel, it is light & easy to maneuver around things... working FANTASTIC! I’m buying one for my daughter for Christmas, no doubt. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: What a great replacement from our shark
customer_reviews.text: We had the shark steam mop for about 5 years before it started acting up and not producing steam. After reading many reviews and articles I decided to give the bissell symphony pet mop and vacuum. What an upgrade!!! This thing saves me so much time as I no longer need to vacuum first then mop. Now I do it all in one and its super amazing. My floors have never been so clean and cleaning the mop is simple so far. I have had it for about 2 months and so far so good. This thing is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how I’ve lived without this thing in my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer/vacuum combo. I use my main sweeper for just heavy sweeping, but it’s nice to have both options for quick jobs. The steamer option is awesome, we had new floor installed & the contractor got something on the floor that was not wiping up. This lifted it off easily. My favorite thing is not needing to use chemicals to clean! The deep boosting attachment & special wet pad worked great as well, just pitch it when done. All attachments are easy to figure out. Totally worth the investment! I don’t know how I’ve lived without this thing in my life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bissell Symphany Pet All-in-One in February 2018. For 3 months it was a great investment. It worked perfect. Then I noticed the floors had puddles here and there and when machine was off it would leak all of the water out of the filter area. Notified Bissell, they sent a replacement and that mop was exactly like the first. The "dummy" filter did not sit flush on the machine. Will never purchase another Bissell product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy I.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing! Vacuum & Steam at the same time! Ahhhhh! Huge time saver! It was really easy to assemble, I read the directions to figure out how to use it properly. It works like a dream. Picks up all sorts of stuff, and makes the floors look pretty after the steam. I like that there are two steam settings (light & heavy) - since for regular use I would only use the light steam setting. Very pleased with this machine & has replaced sweeping / mopping my floors
customer_reviews.author: Spork

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was going to be my saving grace since my diabetic dog has issues using the bathroom in the house therefore I could steam and mop quickly after picking up daily. On the third day of owning the vacuum portion completely quit working, now the mop/steam function is barely working. After spending almost 200 dollars on a machine you would hope it would work for longer than a week. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie V.

customer_reviews.title: Not for DIRTY floors
customer_reviews.text: Not for whole house cleaning. Dirt is picked up by "pads". They get dirty fast. You need to have a large number of them so you can change frequently. A very slow process. May be ok for maintenance(between real cleanings). Water does not last long. Would not recommend. There are easier, more efficient and better cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F. Mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer/vacuum all in one. I haven't used it for vacuuming but use it for steam cleaning my tile and linoleum - the house has tile in kitchen, laundry room and front entry hall and master bath, linoleum in the small bath - works like a charm and does the job it is intended for love. Purchased additional covers and the eucalyptus mint demineralized steam mop additive too. Would recommend this to anyone. Heats up quickly, easy to use and a snap to put together. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HueysMom

customer_reviews.title: It works but i gave it an overall 3 for getting a used item
customer_reviews.text: When i received my vacuum, it appeared to be used. There was a tear in the cord cover and there was condensation in the water tank. Im not okay with paying full price for a used item, however, i did test it out to see if it actually works and it does. I love the concept of 2 in 1 to cut down on time. I would definitely recommend but beware of paying full price for a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Patty McIntyre-Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: omg I love this vacuum/steam mop
customer_reviews.text: omg I love this vacuum/steam mop. I was hesitant to purchase because some of the reviews were a bit negative, but I love it. I use it on my hardwood floors and kitchen floors linoleum (I think its called). vacuum works great, easy to use, very light weight. the steam works amazing. I highly recommend this if you've been sweating your butt off sweeping and mopping your whole house. the cloth for the steamer is super easy to use with a step it clicks off.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra R.

customer_reviews.title: A little finicky
customer_reviews.text: We bought ours and it worked like a champ the first two uses, but then started Leaking on third use. We returned and bought same exact one thinking first one was defective. Second one worked like a champ after 3-4 uses and then it started to leak. I have reached out to see if I was doing something wrong, but I have done exactly what’s been instructed. What it sounds like, and by others who are smarter than me, the gaskets will go bad. I personally don’t want to buy a gasket replacements every month and have to fix it if it’s that finicky. It did the job when it worked. Hoping to find another one similar.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. I actually wore out the first one, after many years of service and immediately bought another. I however tried a different brand and regretted it, threw it away and bought another of these ones. I have three dogs that all go outside and two kids, so I need to run this sweeper daily and it is quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Will not steam brand new out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, the vacuum works, but it will not steam. Contacted Bissell customer service & after a very difficult conversation with a lady in the Philippines (guessing from her accent), they advised we cut the cord from the machine & wait for them to ship us a return label to ship the cord back to them. Once they verify receipt of the cord, they will ship us a new machine. Really!? Not a happy customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: If you have a hairless cat it will work for you!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a hairless cat it will work for you! Poor suction power, can't get to small areas, heavy and hard to maneuver. It literally just pushes the dust, pet hair and litter crystals around! Definitely not for pets! I have a white cat and regardless of how often I vacuum my studio apartment, there's always hair still laying around. The steamer works well. Piece of junk, stay away from it, definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this product. Amazing when it actually works. However. This is my second Bissell symphony to crap out on me. First one wouldn't hold any water and the second one won't steam and is now leaking. For the price you'd think it would last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: What A MESS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sweeper/Steamer when I first got it, used it all the time, but now its dripping water out of the bottom of the machine and it leaves water puddles every where and the sweeper then sucks the water up in the collection cup which makes a huge muddy mess. I bought this refurbished so I'm guessing someone returned it because it didn't work and now i'm stuck with it and out $111.00 bucks. I really wish they would send me another one coz when it did work it was good
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Change mop head frequently
customer_reviews.text: I have light colored wood look ceramic tiles with subtle grooves. This does not get into the grooves. I feel like I’m just spreading wet dirt back across the floor without totally lifting out the dirt. I have to constantly change to a clean mop head to feel like I’m not leaving a smear of dirt on my tiles. The vacuum is great though. I would not use the steam on my area rugs - doesn’t make sense to me - Dragging the damp steam mop back-and-forth over the mat seems ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: I like how clean the floors get after using this steam ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 10 months. I think the high heat from the steam setting cracked the water chamber. I only used it about 1-2 times a month. I never dropped it. I called customer service and they are sending me a new one. Customer service was very pleasant. I like how clean the floors get after using this steam mop. It also dries quicker than using a mop. I hope the next one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amit&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY BISSELL SYMPHONY STEAM MOP AND VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I just got Luxury Vinyl waterproof flooring in my Kitchen and my Bissell Symphony Pet Steam Mop and Steam Vacuum Cleaner works great on it. My 1st and only use so far was right after the flooring was installed. it was full of fine dust from cutting each plank and also little shards or slivers of it and the vacuum pick it all up nicely and the mop cleaned it all spotless in one shot. oh I did have to clean up cat food and it did that great too.
customer_reviews.author: ZSMALLONE

customer_reviews.title: Product works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 German Shepard puppies who come in and out and constantly are getting my white kitchen floor dirty with mud. Prior to purchasing this I was cleaning every night with a mop and bucket. This is nice it picks up the dog hair and dirt as well as cleaning the floor. People need to keep in mind that this does not have a suction tank so the pads are going to hold as much as they can. I don't mind a little streaking, not a big deal. I purchased extra pads so I could use one a day. Works great I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: NO Suction
customer_reviews.text: For the price I thought it would be great for our hardword floors... There is zero suction. all it did was blow pet hair and dirt around. Complete waste of time and money, now for the added hassle of returning it
customer_reviews.author: ohiogirl

customer_reviews.title: Not only am I disappointed, I'm angry
customer_reviews.text: Just barely over one year old, and the machine has stopped producing steam. I've called Bissell with no satisfaction from the "overseas" customer service. Not only am I disappointed, I'm angry. According to Bissell, this machine has a three year manufacturer warranty. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver! (or at least my sanity)
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen floor is dark wood. Dirt shows on it very easily! This cleaner is making my life so much easier, especially since we recently got a dog with white fur and sheds a LOT! The vacuum function works wonderfully, and with the steam mop cleaning the kitchen floor is a one step job and done in half the time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Walton

customer_reviews.title: WIll only last for two years
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does a great job on tile and wood floors. After two years the pump goes out so the water does not go through the system. A bit irritating when you consider the cost. I am buying another bissell that is cheaper but it seems they break at two years regardless. Walmart has this product for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Change the mop pad after each use for best performance.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 grandchildren living with me now and they are messier that pets. 😂 we are constantly sweeping up messes. But since I bought the bissel, it’s so much easier. One swipe and it’s swept and mopped. It’s very easy to use. And sorta fun! I’m not worn out after just sweeping and then mopping and scrubbing my floor. The steam works nicely. And a big plus for me is that it cleans with just water, no toxic chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: R. Haymon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this only one time now. I previously had the shark steam mop. I am amazed and how much this seemed to clean compared to the shark. Yikes. I wasn’t sure if I would use the vacuum portion, but already did. Having two young kids who like to makes a lot of messes, this machine is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: We love "Miss Violet"!
customer_reviews.text: "Miss Violet" is her name at our house and she is the best floor cleaner we've had! Everyone loves using her. We purchased several cloth floor pads and use a new one each time. They wash and dry well. Not a fan of the disposable pads. The water heats quickly and the steam feature works great. But I love being able to vacuum and steam at the same time. We do a quick sweep first to get the bigger items but Miss Violet picks up the dust bunnies that the broom misses. We have 2 indoor dogs and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Got used product but I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Before I begin, I need to say I'm disappointed that it looks like I received a return or used product as my vacuum steamer already had water and persperation in the tank when it arrived. I've only had the chance to clean spot messes and I can say it's way better than my Hoover vacuum at getting in tight areas. I'm still learning to use the steaming function. I have tile and it seems to take some elbow grease for deep cleaning but still makes cleaning way faster than traditional mop and broom. Will update if anything goes wrong or very right 😉
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: saver
customer_reviews.text: i have two dogs; aussie/border collie mix. hair is everywhere all the time no matter how many times i sweep. we have so much tile in the house there was no way to sweep everyday. The vacuum part of this bissell is amazing. has a strong suction. picks up all the dog hair and crumbs. the steamer part is ok. it does leave streaks on the floor but doesnt bother me. i had to reorder the bissell because the first one didnt work (steam part) but the second one came in as soon as i ordered a replacement and worked! use this about every other day just bc its so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lopez

customer_reviews.title: 1 year review- no more steam mop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this for a year. I generally use it as a hard floor vac, which it does a fine job as. I have used the steam mop part of it twice; it worked wonderfully. However, it will no longer heat, steam, or even dampen. A quick search indicates that this is a common problem. If you’re looking for a steam mop, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: dreamyraynbo

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, wish it worked
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this steam mop...... but.... this mop would be great if you have floors that people and pets dont walk on. Seriously its a pad that you super heat the dirt with steam and then spread around the rest of the floor. The vacuum part is ok as long as you have hairless pets, any long hair wraps around the filterclogging the vacuum. If you have hard floors get a proper floor scrubber with tanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. schlueter

customer_reviews.title: steamer difficulties
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have a vacuum and steamer for my kitchen and bathrooms all in one, but after using it for only 2 months the steamer has stopped working. The unit will heat but no steam. I used the required distilled water and still it has stopped working. I tried unclogging the nozzles but that didnt seem to do anything. Im diappointed that I spent the money and it doesnt even last a year and the timeline for my return has expired. I bought it in June and will have to try to go through the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad that I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I bought this! This is a real time saver for me. I have 3 dogs, so I have lots of hair and have to sweep/mop A LOT! I had noticed in another review that it didn't clean up the dried dribbles by the dogs water bowl, so I have found if I spray the dribbles with a vinegar/water solution that I always have on hand before I get started, by the time I get there they clean right up. I'm sure you could spray anything from water to window cleaner, just to get it softened up. A wonderful invention!! My only wish is that I had it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Holler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this steamer for several months now and love how clean it gets both my tile and hardwood floors. I did buy extra cleaning pads and will change them out a few times while cleaning otherwise I found there were streaks left on the hardwood. I recently bought a second cleaner to use at my bf's place and it did a great job on his hardwood as well. He has a bit of build up on his floors from previous cleaners but I saw a difference in how clean they were the first time I used this.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this vac/steam mop as we have 4 large dogs and 3 cats and my shark steam mop was just not cutting it. I am very happy to say that this BISSELL Symphony definitely is a game changer! I just vac/steam mopped to entire bottom floor of our house(tile and pergo) and in 1 swipe this wonderful machine cleaned and mopped without leaving any dirt behind. I was concerned it would not be strong enough, but at this moment, I couldn’t be any more please!
customer_reviews.author: Siris629

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: I have a corgi, a cat, three kids and a husband that often comes home covered in dirt. We have hard wood floors and linoleum through our house. I put it together and put it to work. My husband came home and noticed the difference. Got the dog/cat hair pretty well. For some tough spots in the kitchen I steamed it for a few seconds then stepped on the scrubby part thing to help it scrub. Still minimal effort. I am in love. I had this in my cart for over a month before I pulled the trigger. So glad I treated myself.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: but I really like the concept
customer_reviews.text: I am working on my third one of these. I got the Pet version this time and must say that I prefer the blue one, but I really like the concept. There does seem to be a repetitive issue with the steam operating handle. The previous two stopped steaming, one after three years and one within a year and it feels as though the problem is in the handle although it could be the pump. Still a great time saver and light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Venetia J. Bass

customer_reviews.title: the pad wasn't as dirty if I just steamed alone
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived and my wife had plans for me, not quite what I had in mind, but nonetheless, I am the maintainer of the floors. So I followed the directions, and began to vacuum and steam my hard wood floors. Unit worked well, the steam flowed and the dirt disappeared. I used the vacuum and steamer function together and after doing my entire house, the pad wasn't as dirty if I just steamed alone. Great Job Bissell! For even those who do not have pets, the extra cleaning should be utilized. I walked barefoot and felt no left over debris.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months, leaked from the start
customer_reviews.text: My previous Bissell vacuum lasted 5 years. Not thaaat long, but long enough. This one leaked from the start and completely broked after THREE MONTHS. Avoid this vacuum. Furthermore, Bissell will make you take it in to get fixed (taking your time) and will not just replace the machine, even after a mere few months. They also will not replace broken machines unless PURCHASED DIRECTLY FROM THEM. If you want a machine that breaks after 5 uses, this is the one for you. Otherwise, I suggest going in a different direction.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Started Off Great
customer_reviews.text: The first few uses out of the box, I loved it. The steam was perfect, the clean was amazing. However, I'm two months in and now it will not steam. Even worse, it will not even turn off without unplugging. I'm going to contact customer support to determine what they believe is the problem, since I am month outside of the return window. This would be an awesome item if longevity was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is potentially my favorite household purchase ever. Being able to vacuum and steam mop at the same time, makes my life easier and my floors look so nice! I have 3 cats and a dog so you can imagine the amount of debris that accumulates on the floor. I have not had any issues with it not picking any of it up. I would recommend this to everyone and so happy I went ahead with this purchase. 100% worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: K. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Loved (past tense) the steam mop until it started leaking everywhere
customer_reviews.text: At first, this steam mop was a blessing. High power steam, albeit the mop pads get very dirty quickly, and a vacuum to suck up the dirt! While easy to use, the mop is fairly complicated to clean. Additionally, after only a few months of use it started leaking. I have had the mop for less than a year and whenever I fill up the liquid holder, it leaks all the fluid out from other portions of the mop.
customer_reviews.author: qm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for animal hair clean up - vacuum and steam mop all in one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! The first one crappy put after a ton of use. Should have registered it when I got the first on. Probably wouldnt have had to buy the second one. I did register this on right away!
customer_reviews.author: CarlyFriday

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Except for One Thing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine and recommend it frequently. However, in the 2 year warranty period, the machine needed to be replaced 3 times. Each time the issue was the same - the trigger in the handle that releases the steam goes out. Bissell will send you a refurbished replacement, but the warranty runs from the original date of purchase. If you don’t want to be calling customer service and shipping it back and forth, etc this may not be the machine for you.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: cat hair is gone
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to get use to it. i keep trying to use it like a vacuum back and forth. but if you go slow and in a line, your floor will look like new. i found out using it over and over, is to first use it as a vacuum to pick up the cat hair. if you use it wet the cat hair can get wet and stay on the floor. I use mine on the Laminated floor and bathroom and kitchen tile. I have washed the covers in the the washer and they come out like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and vacuumed nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have concrete floors and I wanted to find something to get in the crevasses. This does not get all I need but it does clean nicely over all. It does vacuum up dog hair very well. I have a German shepherd and clumps of hair every where. So far it has been great vacuuming it up. I do love this product. I do need something with a brush to get in the crevasse tho.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great product for light-every-day cleaning of hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this. My yellow lab leaves little nose water drips or saliva from his muzzle when he lays his muzzle on the floor. Thus, he leaves faint paw print spots when he walks throughout the day. This vacuum is perfect for sucking up daily dog hair/sand and light steam mop our hardwood floor every day. The pad is easy to handle and washes up well.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.S.F.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool for daily pick up
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I read many reviews before buying. It seems like the low reviews were by those who had big messes to tackle. We purchased to use daily on our large downstairs tile in between the deep cleans. It picks up crumbs, tracked in dirt and spills amazingly! It helps to vaccumop then steam over stains and dirt. We have 4 kids (no animals at this time) and it’s a breeze to vaccumop and mop under the kitchen table and areas that get messy fast. And the floors get so clean. If you need a daily tool this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Johnson

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - Steam function defective & Bissell will not resolve
customer_reviews.text: This steam mop/vacuum combo is absolutely awful. I purchased this model a few years ago to help with pet hair & mopping the floor. It lasted me a couple years, with the steam function sporadically breaking down, but nothing too serious. This past Christmas, I decided to replace the one I had. Low & behold, I get 6 uses out of it before the steam function (again) stops working. I contacted Bissell & they basically told me these things happen & that I should probably purchase a replacement from them. The gall!!! No thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Lanahan

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Its a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for about 3 months. Unfortunately Its a total waste of money. It does suck up dog hair but even that's pushing it. I have two golden retrievers (super hairy dogs) I had really hoped to get something to help. But a broom works much better then this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: I did not get paid for my review, although that would have been nice. I recently purchased a home with laminate floors. We have two cats and there is hair every where. I did some research on mop/vacuum appliances and decided based on reviews to try this. For the money, this thing is perfect. It vacuums while mopping or steam cleaning and you can choose which one works best for you. It grabs 99% of the dust and particles in the floor. Only thing I've noticed is that it doesn't do well over transitions, like from hardwood to tile. Other than that, I love it! Best cleaning device I've purchased in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Candice M

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this steam mop. You can choose if you want to just steam, just vacuum or both at the same time. I did both and it did a fantastic job on our laminate floor. It doesn't put down too much water and leave the floor slippery and wet like our old steam mop did. I LOVE the easy fill water tank, it's just a little door that flips down to pour the water into. It comes with a cup to fill it with and I was pleasantly surprised to find that they even thought of a place to store the cup- it goes right on the handle by the cord.
customer_reviews.author: thinice

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly hopeful about this machine. The first time I used it. I was amazed, I was ready to toss my Shark steam mop and not have to vacuum and then mop separately. Second time also pleased. Third time the steam function is broken!! I'm so mad I threw out the box and cannot return it now. I'm soooo glad I didn't throw out my Shark, I've had it for 5 years and it still works great. Buy a shark not this piece of garbage. Oh and by the way the vacuum doesn't allow you to vacuum against edges so what's the point...you still need a regular vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: kat7362

customer_reviews.title: Truly Works
customer_reviews.text: Best floor cleaner we have owned, and we have tried many. We have tile and hard wood and wood vinyl. This product works great on all surfaces. It truly does vacuum up dirt and particles on the floor while at the same time mopping it. Perfect 2in1. It really does work. Great value at a great price. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for 4 months. Then it stopped working. I would give this steam mop 5 stars because I loved the ability to mop and vacuum my house at the same time. However I’m going with 1 star because I feel like for the price it should have lasted longer than 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. It can mop and vaccum at the same time when needed. Heats up fast and catches all the pet hair. Doesn't leave a film and dries so much faster!! I a. So happy with this product. We also purchased the eucalyptus water to add to it and that is great too!! (Only downside is the head is a little wide for some areas but not all.)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kiedaisch

customer_reviews.title: Great floor cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and used it. Swept the stained concrete floors first. But used the vacuum with high steam out of the box. Put the cleaner together quickly, read instructions, and got to work. Was amazed at how much was picked up by vacuum even after sweeping! Floors look CLEAN and changing out the pads is the hardest part but even that is no big deal. Machine left no streaks, was a breeze to use. Even cleaned cow skin rugs! This is an amazing tool and I am quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Have Bissell customer service on speed dial!
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it great! But as many people have mentioned. It breaks within a few months and the steam stops working. Bissell is great about sending a new machine as I suspect they get many calls, but I am on my 3rd one in a year! It's a hassle to call, spend time on the phone with a customer service rep, send them pics of a cut cord of the broken machine for them to send you a replacement. They won't refund your money if you buy it through amazon. Don't buy it find something else!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Very Sensitive to Water Quality
customer_reviews.text: this item quit work after five uses. i used tap water because i didn’t see any information about water restrictions. i imagine if i had used distilled water it may have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT last a year
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this Bissell Steam Mop, it worked well. After a few months, the steam part stopped working and the cleaning solution would drain all over the floor, making another mess. No even a year later, when we use it, we can not leave it sit as it holds NONE of the cleaning solutions, it runs straight through? Not sure why? We have looked it over and can not figure it out. Now we have to purchase another one, will look for a different brand, hopefully, more durable.
customer_reviews.author: AMRC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Absolutely amazing. I have 4 dogs and a cat I have muddy paw prints on the floor a lot and big balls of hair from my Golden’s. I let the floor get bad so I could see what this little thing can do and I am stunned!!! I can’t believe how clean my hard woods look! It vacuumed the hair and mopped the prints at the same time! A life saver if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have a shark steam mop and love it but even when we vaccum before it still finds dirt and just pushes it around. This is the perfect solution. It vaccums well and steam cleans even better. The picture is of just one room in my house next to a clean pad. The only downside is the small dirt container so you have to empty often. Small price to pay for this.
customer_reviews.author: MoxLo84

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Until it Hits 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: I've now have had TWO of these. Both after it literally hits one year start to leak where the liquid is. Never dropped, no damage both leaking in the same spot. Both after exactly one year. Beyond that for the first year it worked great and I loved it. Now I need to go spend MORE money on getting one that will hopefully last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. If you are currently using Shark products then stay with Shark. My Shark steamer leaves the floor really warm. The Bissell barely warms it. Disappointed. The vacuum of this all in one Bissell is certainly no Dyson. Do not be fooled with all the advertising about the All In One by Bissell. It does not have the power.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Armes

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing I have ever bought myself. I am the mom of 7 kids, and my whole bottom floor is linoleum. Sweeping was a nightmare and it took me forever. This sweeper works so well and has saved me so much time in the day. Easy to use, easy to clean. I got a clog, once, and the side pops off for easy matienence. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this machine. I use it to mop and vacuum at the same time AT LEAST once a day. Then once a week I do a more thorough steam mop of my kitchen with it. It empties easily. It fills with water easily. The chord is long. Everything is great. The only thing I would change is the mop pads because they get dirty and even though I clean them right after each use they are pretty gross looking :P
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this, EXCEPT I am suddenly having trouble getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, EXCEPT I am suddenly having trouble getting the tray on. It doesn't line up and click on easily for some reason. It did at first, now it doesn't. This is great for everyday cleaning. It doesn't get edges and corners well. I am real happy with the fact that I can sweep and mom in one step. Every now and then, I mop the old fashioned way to get edges and corners.

customer_reviews.title: Had to Return it
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is really good and has excellent suction power but the down side is that the front wheels are two tiny and is easily jammed by pet hairs or any debris which stops them from rollong causing marks on your hard wood floors and requires cleaning or removing the pet hair from the wheel every other pass you make. I like the vacuum but had to return it because of this problem. I hope the manufacturer is able to fix this by privindkng larger wheel base and mecanism to adjust the floor brush high rather than the current small from wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Fublin3r

customer_reviews.title: If you want it, get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great on my linoleum floor. It sucked up all the cat hair and debris while I was mopping. Usually I do my floor on hands and knees with paper towels and cleaning solution in a spray bottle so I can reach everything. This machine gets just about everything (might have to do a couple corners with paper towels). It is so easy that I can keep up with it and be a happy cleaner instead of dreading the task and putting it off. Now I can go barefoot in my kitchen all the time.
customer_reviews.author: DebD

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water and unable to get problem resolved.
customer_reviews.text: The Symphony worked very well and the vacuum suction is good. After several uses, the water began running straight through the dispenser onto the floor. I called customer service and the representative was very helpful and patient while talking me through troubleshooting. However, we were unable to resolve the problem. I am now stuck with a leaky cleaner that I have only had for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: owl

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I am in Florida so have lots of tile. The vacuum works great as you mop in those corners or under cabinets that you mught have missed and holds quite a large amount. It cleans great and my floors have never looked so goid and no streaks highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jessie0323

customer_reviews.title: Just kind of satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but I wish it did better at shine. Also I have a hard time with the steam handle because I am constantly gripping it and it releases steam probably more often than it should. I wish it had more fabric or different disposal options. It says it lasts 15 minutes but hard to tell when water is foggy
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Wished I got this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting this little vacuum to have so much pick-up power and it steam cleans really well too! I’m very pleased because it saves me so much time to be able to steam clean & vacuum the floors all at once. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great for everyday cleaning quick and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. It works great I have 5 little dogs and most are elderly rescues so we’ll just say they have accidents. It really does a nice job cleaning up both wet and dry mess as well as leaving a nice sent with the eucalyptus and mint scented cleaner. I did not give all 5s because I have grout and it is not going to get down into the grout well and the vacuum portion is great but I also have a cockatoo who throws a lot of food and I try not to use it on that.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum and steam mop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this a few times a week since I purchased it and it’s hands down my favorite quarantine purchase. We have dark hardwood floors in the kitchen and this vacuum grabs all the little crumbs and cat hairs. I don’t steam clean the floors as often, but it’s super easy to use and I love having freshly cleaned floors without all the work of mopping!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Mine kept over heating. Called help line. Did what they said to do It had been off approximately 15 minutes. Cleaned filter. It started working about 15 mins. It got hot and stopped working again. I'm returning it. I want a replacement. When it did work. It was awesome. Vaccum and stems. Loved it. When they replace it. I'll do another review.
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Best steam cleaner and vacuum I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and awesome cleaning ability. I am disabled and I can use it from my chair. It’s easy to push and guide to clean and vacuum floors.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy/Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I really miss the original symphony mop-vac. The trigger broke on my original so I ordered this and it is very cumbersome so I returned it without using.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: WIN, WIN, WIN! Two temp. Steam mop, bagless vac, disspossable pads.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only steam mop to use disposable pads. I’m on my second Synphony in 5 yrs. I don’t care if I have to buy a new unit every few years. There’s nothing else out there that can do what this machine does. PLUS! It uses DISSPOSSABLE pads. That was and is my main reason for using the symphony. You cannot steam vac your entire house using washable pads. “Unless you have at least a half dozen or so...” Symphony for my hardwood and tile floors. Bissell Pro heat 2 pet plus for my area rugs. You cannot and will not beat this combo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this All-in-One when I first received it. I liked it so much that I stocked up on the swifter pads and fragrance disc. I have had this for just over a year. I have used only distilled water. Now there is no steam at all. It is just a vacuum. I expected this machine to work for longer then 1 year. Very disappointed and I do not intend to purchase another one. I have a lot of wasted supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Business Owners Stockton, CA

customer_reviews.title: If I could I would by several, just for me
customer_reviews.text: OMG...I just purchased a new house with vinyl floors and I have 3 dogs and the amount of dog hair that accumulated on my floors was astonishing. The basic broom just aired the dog hair around the house and the mop did nothing but blended the hair into the floor. I was so frustrated until I purchased the Bissel Pet Steamer. IT'S SO AMAZING...I LOVE IT. It makes my house appear sanitized.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and pet clean up!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! Wish there was a scrubbing part on the cloth pad for the steam option ((we have young messy littles)) and the location of the continuous steam button is a tad annoying when only wanting to vacuum ((but I havent investigated to see if steam can be off, so it could just be user error)) otherwise we love it! I already have family and friends wanting to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud and doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I was impress about the youtube advertising but definitely it doesn't do the job. 1st of all is extremely loud when you use the vacuum and the suction power is very low comparing to the shark vacuums. I have a cordless shark vacuum and the difference is 100%. 2nd the steam mop has the same issue, the power is not enough and the size of the mop is small comparing to other steam mops from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Porras

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets or kids then this is for you..
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets or kids then I recommend this for you! I have all hardwood floors with a cat and dog.. the fur, drooling, and even puking is constant. The vacuum does way better then I expected and the steam does so good! My fiancé bought me mine For Christmas and I loved it so much I bought it for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Lake

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: The wife wanted one of these for her christmas present. We have 5 indoor dogs and hardwood floors and tile through out the house. This thing is incredible. It picks up hair, dust and dirt before it gets steamed and cleans the floors. It makes a multi step job that took an hour or more every day in a few minutes with one step.
customer_reviews.author: smaj100

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first. It's light, like an upgraded swiffer. The vacuum is just ok, doesn't push over carpet well. Could never find the item number to register it with Bissell though, I looked everywhere. Maybe 20 uses later, it stopped working. Put the water in and it leaks all over the floor right away, the steam function doesn't steam anymore. Way too expensive a product to break so quickly. I am extremely disappointed and would not buy if I could do it again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pets
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 cats and when you get alittle hair in tank it barely has any sucking power. Then if you put on the steamer part good luck picking up any litter. With regular use it hardly picks up any bigger pieces. Would have returned if I would have known.
customer_reviews.author: Melgumina6

product_meta.title: Bissell Symphony Pet Steam Mop and Steam Vacuum Cleaner for Hardwood and Tile Floors, with Microfiber Mop Pads, 1543A,Purple
product_meta.description:
Style Name:All-in-One VacuumCleaning up after your pets just got easier with the BISSELL Symphony Pet All in One Vacuum & Steam Mop that allows you to vacuum up pet hair and debris and steam clean your floors at the same time. Cleaning with the natural power of steam sanitizes* floors, eliminating 99.9 percent of germs and bacteria.* The exclusive Drop IT Tank technology keeps you from having to reach into your dirt tank when emptying and the disposable pads allow you to throw away your pet messes immediately after cleaning. *When used as directed, using the microfiber pads. Surface Type: Bare Floors, Sealed Hard Floors

BRAND STORY
By Bissell
feature_bullets: Every BISSELL purchase helps save pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Vacuum And Steam Your Floors At The Same Time
The Pet Model Features The Exclusive Drop-It Tank Emptying System Which Prevents You From Getting Your Hands Dirty
The Pet Model Includes Disposable Pads For Those Pet Messes You'd Rather Throw Away And Washable Microfiber Pads For Everyday Cleaning
Powerful, Cyclonic Vacuum Helps Capture Pet Hair And Debris. Power rating: 1100 Watts for Steam / 400 Watts for Vacuum / 3. 3 Vacuum Amps
INCLUDES: (1) microfiber soft pad, (1) microfiber scrubby pad, detachable mop pad tray, detachable Steam boost tray, (4) Swiffer BISSELL Steam boost disposable pads.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,242 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
